seeds.title: Secure the digital front door
seeds.today: Change Wi-Fi admin password (router login), and store it safely.
seeds.this_week: Turn on a guest Wi-Fi network for visitors and smart gadgets.
seeds.this_month: Check router firmware + disable remote admin if it’s on.

seeds.title: Make updates automatic
seeds.today: Enable auto-updates on phones and laptops.
seeds.this_week: Turn on device lock (PIN/FaceID) and auto-lock timer.
seeds.this_month: Set up a simple backup for the most important device.

seeds.title: Protect the root accounts
seeds.this_week: Update recovery options (backup email/number) and remove old ones.
seeds.this_month: Use a password manager for the top 5 accounts.

seeds.title: Create a household scam script
seeds.today: Agree one rule: ‘No clicks when urgent. Verify first.’
seeds.this_week: Pick verification routes (bank card number, official site, known contact).
seeds.this_month: Teach children a simple ‘Stop / Tell / Check’ routine.

seeds.title: Protect sleep and attention
seeds.today: Charge phones away from beds tonight.
seeds.this_week: Set one ‘screen off’ time that is realistic.
seeds.this_month: Create a calm app/notification tidy-up (just 10 minutes).
